channel.title: Editing Starter Skills
channel.description: I need to know where, and what to look for when I'm trying to edit what skills you start with when you log into my server, I'm running a 317 by the way, WoeshieScape.

item.title: Editing Starter Skills
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“I D D S I, post:4, topic:279897”]under the additem add something like this: addSkillXP(14000000, 0);

means he will get 99 attack when he login[/quote]

le me explain lol , so u got to find starter , find tht u wil see additem(****…) bla bla

under all those additems add [code=c] addSkillXP(********, ++);
******** means the xp in the skill and ++ means the skill number

Enjoy!

Georgio[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Editing Starter Skills

under the additem add something like this: addSkillXP(14000000, 0);

means he will get 99 attack when he login

item.title: Editing Starter Skills
item.dc:creator: @Fight247 Fight247
item.description:
@Fight247 wrote:

If you login how many cash do you get?

EXAMPLE:

I login and i get 30Mill

Go to client.java and search 30000000

U will see like this: addItem(995, 30000000) ect

Read full topic
